channel.title: Exp rate [PI]
channel.description:
So my server had different exp rate than normal. It looks like this:
[code]c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*4/3), 4); [/code]
I tried to add it like config way... You know:
[code] public static final int MELEE_EXP_RATE = 1500; public static final int RANGE_EXP_RATE = 1500; public static final int MAGIC_EXP_RATE = 1500;[/code]
And I replaced the first code with this:
[code]c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.MELEE_EXP_RATE/3), 0); [/code]
I replaced every old code with this new code. So my problem is my exp rate didn't change. So can you help me to change my exp rate?

item.title: Exp rate [PI]
item.dc:creator: @PIEBAR2FAR PIEBAR2FAR
item.description:
@PIEBAR2FAR wrote:

i may be wrong but go back to the original code and change the first four to whatever if that doesn’t work undo it and change the 3.

Read full topic
